description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. xTreme Surfer x is the pinnacle of entertainment. The surfing junkie loves his pills, but he can't get enough! Help him get his meds before he is crushed by the obstacles in his wake.
description.short: xTreme Surfer x is the pinnacle of entertainment. The surfing junkie loves his pills, but he can't get enough! Help him get his meds before he is crushed by the obstacles in his wake.
